name: The Legacy Artifact
description: In an ancient legend, an artifact of immense power was torn apart and scattered. The pieces, when brought together and reforged, promise unimaginable might. Take on this challenging quest, drawing upon a multitude of skills, to bring the artifact back to life.

text: Greetings, adventurer. Legends speak of a powerful artifact,
one that requires mastery of various skills to restore.
The first part is the Elemental Ore, a mineral buried deep within
the earth. Mine it so we can begin our journey.
completedText: Have you found the Elemental Ore yet?

1.nextStage: Using the elemental ore, you must now combine it with your knowledge of smithing to forge the Elemental Blade Base.

popup.title: Stage completed!
popup.text: @green@You have mined the @crimson@Elemental Ore@green@. Proceed to the next step to smith the blade base.

2.nextStage: With the Elemental Blade Base crafted, it's time to move onto fletching. Craft an Elemental Bowstring using ancient woods.

popup.title: Stage completed!
popup.text: @green@You have smithed the @crimson@Elemental Blade Base@green@. Proceed to the next step to craft the bowstring.

3.nextStage: Now that you have the Elemental Bowstring, combine it with the Blade Base to create the Elemental Bow Frame using crafting.

popup.title: Stage completed!
popup.text: @green@You have fletched the @crimson@Elemental Bowstring@green@. Proceed to the next step to craft the bow frame.

4.nextStage: With the Elemental Bow Frame in hand, the final step is to infuse it with magic using alchemy to unlock its true potential.

popup.title: Stage completed!
popup.text: @green@You have crafted the @crimson@Elemental Bow Frame@green@. Proceed to the final step to infuse it with magic.

popup.title: Quest completed!
popup.text: @green@Congratulations! You have successfully combined all the components and crafted the @crimson@Legacy Artifact@green@. As a reward, you've been given a @crimson@Magic Lamp@green@!
